        <api_name>global.ProgramManagementTokyoUpgradeHelper</api_name>

        <description/>
        <name>ProgramManagementTokyoUpgradeHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ProgramManagementTokyoUpgradeHelper = Class.create();
ProgramManagementTokyoUpgradeHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    updateReferenceQualifierOnProgram: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'pm_program');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(fieldName == 'business_unit'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') && gr.getValue('reference_qual').indexOf('ProjectManagementUtils().getActiveBusinessUnitIdsForProgram') != -1){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', '');
						gr.setWorkflow(false);
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on program table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on program table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
				else if(fieldName == 'portfolio'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') && gr.getValue('reference_qual').indexOf('ProjectManagementUtils().getActivePortfolioIdsForProgram') != -1){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript:"sys_class_name="+SNC.PPMConfig.getPortfolioTable(current.getTableName())');
						gr.setWorkflow(false);
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on program table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on program table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
				else if(fieldName == 'department'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') && gr.getValue('reference_qual').indexOf('ProjectManagementUtils().getActiveDepartmentIdsForProgram') != -1){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual',"javascript: current.business_unit ? 'business_unit=' + current.business_unit : ''");
						gr.setWorkflow(false);
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on program table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on program table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on program table does not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating reference qualifier on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}
	},
	updateDefaultValueOnProgram: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'pm_program');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(gr.getValue('default_value')){
					if(gr.getValue('default_value').indexOf('ProjectManagementUtils().getDefaultBusinessUnitIdForProgram') != -1 && fieldName == 'business_unit'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', '');
					}
					else if(gr.getValue('default_value').indexOf('ProjectManagementUtils().getDefaultPortfolioIdForProgram') != -1 && fieldName == 'portfolio'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', '');
					}
					else if(gr.getValue('default_value').indexOf('ProjectManagementUtils().getDefaultDepartmentIdForProgram') != -1 && fieldName == 'department'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', '');
					}
					gr.setWorkflow(false);
					gr.update();
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on program table has been updated');
				}
				else {
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on program table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on program table does not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating default value on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}
	},
    type: 'ProgramManagementTokyoUpgradeHelper'
};]]></script>
